exterior.confident: With its confident shape, the design naturally draws attention.
exterior.strongPresence: A Strong Presence, Built to Inspire Confidence
exterior.description1: The Leapmotor C10 merges technological innovation with natural elegance. Its balanced front design with LED auto headlights creates a confident, modern signature, while the trident hub wheels add sportiness and power.
exterior.description2: From the side, three sculpted waist lines emphasize motion and harmony, giving the profile a sleek, purposeful look. At the rear, the airfoil-style spoiler enhances aerodynamics and reinforces the sporty yet elegant aesthetic.
exterior.description3: A design where beauty meets power — striking to look at, advanced to drive.
exterior.ledDesc: Their futuristic design integrates seamlessly into the vehicle's aerodynamic profile, combining functionality with a modern aesthetic.
exterior.flushDesc: Seamlessly integrated into the body, hidden door handles enhance the modern design and improve aerodynamic efficiency.
exterior.wiperDesc: The hidden rear wiper maintains a clean silhouette, improves aerodynamics, and ensures clear visibility in all weather.
exterior.wheelsDesc: Bold 20" alloy sporty wheels for performance or the sleek 18" double five-spoke wheels for lightweight efficiency.

home.bannerSubheading: The new generation of electric vehicles.
home.bannerSubheadingB03X: Elegant lines, modern character, and a look that never goes unnoticed.
home.bannerSubheadingB10: Smart innovation engineered for a superior driving experience.
home.bannerSubheadingNewB03X: Comfort, roominess, and sophistication in every journey.
home.bannerSubheadingT03: Dynamic performance with the smoothness of electric mobility.

c10.heading: C10
c10.subheading: 100% Electric | Hybrid EV | All Wheel Drive
c10.discoverSubheading: Electric or extended range, for every journey.

interiorComponent.chargerDesc: Advanced fast charging technology allows you to charge efficiently and reduce charging time significantly.

brand.section0Desc:
We, Leapmotor, believe that the future of sustainable mobility should be accessible to everyone. And since the creation of our brand in 2015, we've taken the challenge to democratize green mobility by continuously developing products that combines cutting-edge technologies, eco-friendly innovations and affordability to redefine a green mobility for all.
    Our intelligent powertrain, our battery pack and management technologies are all developed in-house and was the world's first pure EV company to implement CTC (Cell-To-Chassis) technology on a large scale since 2022. This approach allows us a competitive edge on quality and cost control, and to deliver exceptional values to our customers.
brand.section1Title: Life easing Technologies that make real differences
brand.section1Desc:
We envision a future where smart innovations power every journey. Our electric cars seamlessly integrate advanced technologies and sustainable designs to enhance your daily life. With Leapmotor drive forward into a smarter, greener tomorrow - where innovations meet everyday excellence.

With Leapmotor, driving electric is not only a smart choice, but also a lifestyle
brand.section2Title: Long-Standing Sales and Service powered by Stellantis for every journey
brand.section2Desc: Leapmotor International is a joint-venture between Stellantis and Leapmotor to proudly distribute Leapmotor products out of China. Powered by the solid expertise and the experienced distribution network of Stellantis, our mission is to provide customers all over the world with the best in class customer experiences in terms of sales, aftersales, services and parts.

contact.title: Tell us how we can help you
